definition: host
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
surname Dong

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
host/official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)

sentences.english: Afghanistan's Second Vice President Abdul Karim Khalili was present at the meeting as guest of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗第二副總統哈利利作爲東道國客人出席會議。

sentences.english: You can host all international domains with no restrictions.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在東道國的所有國際域名沒有任何限制。

sentences.english: For this to happen, the host countries need to have credible development plans.
sentences.chinese: 要實現這一目標，東道國需要有可信的發展計劃。

sentences.english: His pronouncements were cited with awe by our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 我們的中國東道主們對他的每句話都奉若神明。

sentences.english: " asked Chile's Mercurio newspaper after Brazil had eliminated the hosts in the semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 智利《水星》報在巴西隊半決賽淘汰東道主後發問。

sentences.english: Let's bet on the final result of the match.
sentences.chinese: 咱們就以這場球賽的勝負來賭東道。

sentences.english: Li Kaimian who comes from amphitryon institution was the key compere of the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 研討會是由東道主單位的李開綿作爲總的主持人。

sentences.english: The Olympic Games shall be proclaimed open by the Head of State of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 奧運會由東道國國家元首宣佈開幕。

sentences.english: I want to thank our host Belgium for the thoughtful arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 感謝東道主比利時爲本屆會議所做的周到安排。

sentences.english: Xabi Alonso, Albert Riera and Alvaro Arbeloa will also be hoping to play against the host nation.
sentences.chinese: 阿隆索列拉阿貝羅阿也有望上場與東道主交手。

sentences.english: Qin added that China is both the host country and the participant of this round of Six-Party Talks.
sentences.chinese: 他說，中方既是本輪六方會談的東道主，也是參與者。

sentences.english: And finally I want to express our deep appreciation to our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我希望對我們的中國東道主表示誠摯的謝忱。

sentences.english: That is why I prattle and chatter lightly and hide my heart behind words.
sentences.chinese: 是以我輕鬆地說東道西，把我的心藏在說話的後面。

sentences.english: As the host, we warmly welcome all the delegations to Beijing again.
sentences.chinese: 作爲東道主，我們熱烈歡迎各方代表團的再次到來。

sentences.english: And finally, I want to express our deep appreciation to our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 末了，我志願對我們的中國東道主表示誠摯的謝忱。

sentences.english: My reply did not rise to the nobility of my host.
sentences.chinese: 我的答辭沒有滿足東道主的厚望。

definition: to talk about this and that (idiom); to ramble incoherently
lit. deal sincerely and fairly (idiom); frank and open-minded/plain speaking/Let's talk frankly and openly between ourselves./to put one's cards on the table
to check an amount
basis point (finance), abbr. to 基點|基点[ji1 dian3]
to display one's slight skill before an expert (idiom)
circular finger movement (in playing plucked instrument)/strumming
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
personality cult
to concentrate on the main points (idiom); to bring out the essentials
to praise the virtue of sb or sth while concealing their faults
fight to the death/desperate struggle
sequel/continuation of a book
proposition/argument
(TCM) observation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
confused/disorderly/incoherent
historical materialism (Marx's theory of history)
pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4
